channel.title: New York City on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The Extravagant Rise of the Corporate Incentive Trip
item.description: From skydiving trips in Dubai to Michelin-starred meals in Paris, some companies are rewarding top performers with once-in-a-lifetime travel experiences.
